meanings.definition: Without regard to circumstances or consequences.
meanings.sent1: She continued to walk regardlessness of the rain pouring down.
meanings.sent2: He always helps others regardlessness of his own needs.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed regardlessness of the closed door.
meanings.sent4: The sun shines brightly regardlessness of the clouds in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The flower blooms beautifully regardlessness of the season.

meanings.sent1: Regardlessness of the delay, they arrived at the party on time.
meanings.sent2: She decided to pursue her dreams regardlessness of the obstacles in her way.
meanings.sent3: The dog wagged its tail regardlessness of the broken toy.
meanings.sent4: His determination to succeed shines through regardlessness of the challenges he faces.
meanings.sent5: The tree stands tall and strong regardlessness of the stormy weather.
